org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.platform

Interface PlatformTarget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlatformAbstractQueryCursor, PlatformAbstractTarget, PlatformAffinity, PlatformAffinityFunctionTarget, PlatformAtomicLong, PlatformAtomicReference, PlatformAtomicSequence, PlatformBinaryProcessor, PlatformCache, PlatformCacheIterator, PlatformClusterGroup, PlatformCompute, PlatformContinuousQueryProxy, PlatformDataStreamer, PlatformEvents, PlatformFieldsQueryCursor, PlatformListenableTarget, PlatformMessaging, PlatformProcessorImpl, PlatformQueryCursor, PlatformServices, PlatformTransactions

    public interface PlatformTarget
    Interop target abstraction.
